nodes.text: The Inner Moddell systems were a group a star systems in the spinward Moddell sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
The Inner Moddell systems included Annaj (the sector capital), Hanchin and its moon Qina, Kuna's Tooth, Maya Kovel, Ovise, Thonner, Vasha, and Vex.
Most of the Moddell sector's traffic was found on the Annaj-Houche Run, mading up the Inner Moddell systems. Traffic dropped off considerably in the Outer Moddell beyond those systems.
